verses.roman:
āra dine mukunda-datta kahe prabhura sthāne
brahmānanda-bhāratī āilā tomāra daraśane

synonyms: āra dine—the next day; mukunda-datta—Mukunda Datta; kahe—said; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sthāne—at the place; brahmānanda-bhāratī—Brahmānanda Bhāratī; āilā—has come; tomāra daraśane—to see You.
translation: The next day Mukunda Datta informed Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, "Brahmānanda Bhāratī has come to see You."
